00082 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccTag;

00095 struct IccTagEntry
00096 {
00097 
00098   icTag TagInfo;
00099   CIccTag* pTag;
00100 };
00101 
00110 typedef std::list<IccTagEntry> TagEntryList;
00111 
00119 typedef struct {CIccTag *ptr;} IccTagPtr;
00120 
00129 typedef std::list<IccTagPtr> TagPtrList;
00130 
00131 typedef enum {
00132   icVersionBasedID,
00133   icAlwaysWriteID,
00134   icNeverWriteID,
00135 }icProfileIDSaveMethod;

00146 class ICCPROFLIB_API CIccProfile  
00147 {
00148 public:
00149   CIccProfile();
00150   CIccProfile(const CIccProfile &Profile);
00151   CIccProfile &operator=(const CIccProfile &Profile);
00152   virtual ~CIccProfile();
00153 
00154   icHeader m_Header;
00155 
00156   TagEntryList *m_Tags;
00157 
00158   CIccTag* FindTag(icSignature sig);
00159   bool AttachTag(icSignature sig, CIccTag *pTag);
00160   bool DeleteTag(icSignature sig);
00161   CIccMemIO* GetTagIO(icSignature sig); //caller should delete returned result
00162         bool ReadTags(CIccProfile* pProfile); // will read in all the tags using the IO of the passed profile
00163 
00164   bool Attach(CIccIO *pIO);
00165   bool Detach();
00166   bool Read(CIccIO *pIO);
00167   icValidateStatus ReadValidate(CIccIO *pIO, std::string &sReport);
00168   bool Write(CIccIO *pIO, icProfileIDSaveMethod nWriteId=icVersionBasedID);
00169 
00170   void InitHeader();
00171   icValidateStatus Validate(std::string &sReport) const;
00172 
00173   icUInt16Number GetSpaceSamples() const;
00174 
00175   bool AreTagsUnique() const;
00176         bool IsTagPresent(icSignature sig) const { return (GetTag(sig)!=NULL); }
00177 
00178 protected:
00179 
00180   void Cleanup();
00181   IccTagEntry* GetTag(icSignature sig) const;
00182   IccTagEntry* GetTag(CIccTag *pTag) const;
00183   bool ReadBasic(CIccIO *pIO);
00184   bool LoadTag(IccTagEntry *pTagEntry, CIccIO *pIO);
00185   bool DetachTag(CIccTag *pTag);
00186 
00187   // Profile Validation functions
00188   icValidateStatus CheckRequiredTags(std::string &sReport) const;
00189   bool CheckTagExclusion(std::string &sReport) const;
00190   icValidateStatus CheckHeader(std::string &sReport) const;
00191   icValidateStatus CheckTagTypes(std::string &sReport) const;
00192   bool IsTypeValid(icTagSignature tagSig, icTagTypeSignature typeSig) const;
00193   bool CheckFileSize(CIccIO *pIO) const;
00194 
00195   CIccIO *m_pAttachIO;
00196 
00197   TagPtrList *m_TagVals;
00198 };
